trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Carson
There were no other sightings in Carson on or around January 1st 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on the Porch on Jan. 1 2008 and I was on the phone and I noticed a Black looking thing in the sky it looked and I know this might sound strange but it looked just like the Moon Lunar Lander and it was just in one spot staying there. And I thought what is that? So I walked to the and of my lawn and there was a telephone pole and I seen it from the other side of the pole (It still didn't move I did) so I thought and said to the person on the phone "DAMN that's a UFO I got to get my camera" and I Ran to the house and got my Camera out (20 Feet away) so in less than 10 seconds I was out there but it was gone and it was a clear day and it was just gone. I don't care how fast something can go I should have been able to see where it was going but it just Vanished. I wished I got my camera as soon as I seen it or I stayed outside to see how it took off, dissapeared and what ever happened. I was watching one of those UFO show about a month later and on one of the video clips I seen the SAME thing I seen and I got up and said "THAT'S IT, THAT's THE SAME THING I SEEN!" Nicholas PS Please feel free to contact me.
Summary: It looked just like the Moon Lander but it was Black
